channel.title: Kieron Brewer - Minnesota based digital marketer and whiskey drinker
channel.description: Web analytics and whskey, what do they have to do with each other? Lets find out together.

item.title: Sam Adams Octoberfest

item.title: About this site, and Kieron
item.author: Author
item.description: Hi, thanks for paying some attention to my corner of the internet. So I’m Kieron, a Scotsman based near Minneapolis Minnesota since 2005. I’m a digital marketer by trade with a wide range of experience in the past two decades. Kieron Brewer Particular areas of focus have been: paid search, digital analytics, tag management, marketing automation, email campaigns, digital body language, and site building. In my spare time I spend way too much time online, usually learning and practicing with new technology tools.
